item.title: Legal Watchdog: D.C. Police Demand $1.57 Million To Release Jan. 6 Bodycam Footage
item.description: The non-profit published a press release outlining the department's demands in response to a Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) lawsuit.

item.title: Top 13 Moments From Trump’s 2025 Address To Congress
item.description: In no particular order, here are the biggest moments from Trump's address to Congress.

item.title: Vermont And Massachusetts Schools Punish Students For ‘Only 2 Genders’ Shirts
item.description: Students have been disciplined for wearing shirts saying 'There are only 2 genders,' with one case pending before the Supreme Court.

item.title: Anyone Who Calls A Man A Woman Immediately Erases His Own Credibility
item.description: We are in a civilizational moment where we must all resolve to reject, without apology or explanation, this deception in every form.

item.title: The Pentagon’s $850B Nightmare Will Be DOGE’s Biggest Challenge Yet
item.description: The Pentagon doesn’t appear to have a battle plan to turn around seven straight years of audit failures.
